alert.note: Alert for Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 26 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Otero and northwestern Hudspeth Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 340 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles south of Timberon to 12 miles southeast of Desert Haven. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Loma Linda, Desert Haven, Cornudas, Cornudas Mountains, and The Otero Mesa. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin
